SKT_FIRST.name: Voice of a Songbird
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, if the enemy has no <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color>, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>. If the enemy has a <color=#28d9ed>buff</color>, has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 攻撃後、効果命中UP+3ターン

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: すべてのスキルターン-2ターン

description: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, if the enemy has no <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color>, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000061_1_2]</color>. If the enemy has a <color=#28d9ed>buff</color>, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000061_1_1]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000061_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. 공격 후 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>가 없다면 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 증가시킵니다. <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 보유하고 있다면 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>がない場合、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>UPさせる。対象に<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>がある場合、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Bursting Patriotism
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) When an enemy uses a <color=#28d9ed>non-attack skill</color>, activates an <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color>.\nGrants all allies increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack and Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: (Triggered Effect) When an enemy uses a <color=#28d9ed>non-attack skill</color>, activates an <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color>.\nGrants all allies increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack and Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000061_2_2] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (발동 효과) 적이 <color=#28d9ed>공격이 아닌 스킬</color> 사용 시 <color=#28d9ed>신속 대응</color> 효과가 발동합니다.\n아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력과 방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (発動効果)敵が<color=#28d9ed>攻撃以外のスキル</color>を使用時、<color=#28d9ed>【迅速対応】</color>を発動する。\n【迅速対応】:味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力と防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Perforator
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000061_3_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000061_3_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상 모두에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>강화 불가</color>를 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象全体に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>強化不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Generates <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Generates <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000061_chain_1_1]</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000061_backup_1_1]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000061_backup_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>의 CP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、CPを<color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>回復する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。
